description:
Does The Thought of Using Photoshop Make You Want to Cry?

Are You Tired of Hiring Outsourcers Every Time You Want Some Simple Graphic Created?

Listen, I'm not a technical person. I know just enough to get by... or get myself into trouble. But I need graphics a LOT!

These days, having good, eye-catching graphics for social media and other uses is CRITICAL. How else are people supposed to share your brand message if they don't have something to pass along to their own friends and family?

I'm talking about things like quote graphics, sales graphics, infographics and more. What about your Facebook cover image? Do you change it at least once a month? It's valuable real estate to offer what you're selling, but if you never change it then your page will get stale.

What about book covers? Do you ever need to create one on the fly for a Kindle book or even a free report?

Need a snazzy looking opt-in form, but can't afford to hire a pricey designer to do it for you?

The great news is that YOU can do all of these things and more as we walk through the videos in this course together! I love using Picmonkey and Canva for almost all of my graphics needs. I will show you how you can do the same!

In less than an hour, you can be up and running, creating your own graphics on demand. Let's get started!
title: DIY Beautiful Social Graphics That Don't Require Photoshop
